focusLock.description: Defaults to false. If `true`, enables focus lock with default options. If object, passes props directly to react-focus-lock

onClose.description: Callback that fires when the user attempts to leave the component

onEventBehind.description: Callback that fires when an event occurs behind the component

portalElem.description: Element to attach the component to, use document.body for "modal" behavior

stretch.description: Stretches the width of the container
